department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide Correctional Service Canada a Regional Individual Standing Offer for the supply and delivery of soft drinks on an as requested basis to Stony Mountain Institution Canteen in Stony Mountain, Manitoba.
description: This request for standing offers (RFSO) cancels and supersedes previous RFSO number Doc3807826249 dated 2022-12-30 with a closing of 2023-01-16 at 2:00 PM. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by March 6, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Number
WS3800546857

## Tender Title
[In English and French]
- **English**: Soft Drinks for Inmate Canteen
- **French**: Boissons sans alcool pour la cantine des détenus

## Notice Details

- **Publication Date**: 2023-02-15
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-03-06 (14:00:00 EST)
- **Amendment Date**: 2023-02-28
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: No date specified (anticipated: 2023-04-01)
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-01-31

## Contract Requirements

- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau (Quebec), K1A 0S5, Canada
- **Contact Information**: Matthew (SPAC/PSPC) at matthew.havrilenko@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Tender Details

The request for standing offers (RFSO) supersedes the previous RFSO (Doc3807826249 dated 2022-12-30). Bidders must submit their proposals by 14:00:00 EST on 2023-03-06.

## Procurement Category
Goods and Services (GD)

## Procurement Method
Competitive - Open bidding

## Notice Type
Request for Standing Offer (Demande d’offre à commandes)

## Selection Criteria
Lowest Price

## Trade Agreements
Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and other agreements

## Regions of Delivery
Manitoba, Canada

## Tender URL
[In English and French]
- **English**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15432427?extsite=MTU0MzI0MjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
- **French**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15432427?extsite=MTU0MzI0MjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note. Please ensure that the bid submission deadline is met. All bids submitted after 14:00:00 EST on 2023-
